titleStmt.title: Threnos' militarius ingeminatus; sive, mnemosynum lapidarium lotharingii ducis & Schombergi, gemini in re militari coryphæi heroûm duo, uno eodemq; anno defuncti, sempiternæ memoriæ, et sepulchrali marmori consecratum. Per J, N. M.D.
titleStmt.author: J. N.

notesStmt.note: "Frederici ducis Schombergi M.S." has caption title with separate pagination and register.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
